member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Hashes the given input into MD5.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the given input equals one of the values.
member.returns: Returns boolean which checks if the input line contains any of the given values.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the input string to a short value.
member.returns: Returns the input string converted to short.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given input to integer.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given input string to long.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the given input string to date time.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes the first character of the given input string.
member.returns: Returns the input with the upper first character.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a string that starts with and ends with a selected string. The end result starts from a index start index.
member.param: Starts from index. If no start index is selected the default index equals 0.
member.returns: Return the converted string from the given start until its end.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the cyrillic letters to latin in a given string input.
member.returns: Returns the input with changed letters type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the latin letters to cyrillic ones in the given string input.
member.returns: Returns the converted letters to cyrillic type.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the given input string for user name.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the given input string for a file.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first characters from a given string.
member.returns: Return the given input string with the characters selected count.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the input last extension from the given input file name.
member.returns: Returns the last extension in a lowercase.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the content type of the given input string file extension.
member.returns: Returns the content type of the input file extension string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
